title: FS a few more tougher backed PSA T206 HOFers
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: FS a few more tougher backed PSA T206 HOFers
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
In addition to the Marquard lot listed this morning, I have these to offer up too to help stack some cheese:

T206 1911 American Beauty 460 Jenning Two Hands PSA 3 $255

T206 1910 EPDG Bresnahan Batting PSA 3.5 (somehow bought two of these!) $SOLDDD
T206 1911 Sovereign 460 Chance Batting PSA 3.5 $SOLDD
T206 1911 Red Hundu Duffy best looking PSA 2 around, a few paper scratches on back, but super crisp $SOLDDD
1910 American Beauty 350 NO FRAME Baker SGC 40 $SOLDDDD
1909 Hindu Lajoie Port sharp but some paper loss SGC 20 $SOLDDD



Thanks for the time,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
I would be willing to listen to some trade talk if there is a Hindu, EPDG, or Lenox Johnson, American Beauty Eddie Collins, T215 Collins!, or a Drum HOFer to be had, I guess I could use a Lenox, Cycle, or AB Merkle too.
